title: News24.com | 26 prisoners, officials test positive for Covid-19 at East London prison
description: Covid-19 has hit the East London Correctional Centre, where 23 correctional services officials and three inmates tested positive for the virus., the justice department has revealed.
content:
Covid-19 has hit the East London Correctional Centre, where 23 correctional services officials and three inmates tested positive for the virus.
Justice Minister Ronald Lamola confirmed on Sunday 26 cases have been detected in the female section.
Lamola, who… [+3570 chars]
